name: Backöfele

description: A popular spot for healthy, street food-style vegetarian and vegan dishes.

description: A charming café known for its cozy interior and freshly prepared snacks and beverages.

name: Café Mozart
description: A vibrant café-bistro offering a bustling atmosphere, craft cocktails, and an array of global dishes.

name: Würzburg Residence
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, this baroque palace is renowned for its stunning architecture and gardens.

name: Marienberg Fortress
description: A historic fortress offering panoramic views of the city and housing several museums.

name: Würzburg City Library
description: The main public library offering a vast collection of books, digital media, and study spaces.

description: A local branch library providing a selection of books and community events.

name: REWE
description: A popular supermarket known for its fresh produce and bakery section.

description: A picturesque restaurant located by the Old Main Bridge, offering Franconian cuisine with river views.

name: Il Grano
description: An Italian restaurant known for its authentic dishes and cozy atmosphere.

name: Café Fred
description: A modern café offering a variety of breakfast options, pastries, and specialty coffees.

name: Kaffee Manufaktur
description: A specialty coffee roastery and café known for its high-quality brews and cozy setting.

name: Alte Mainbrücke (Old Main Bridge)
description: A historic bridge adorned with statues, offering scenic views of the Main River and the city.

name: Käppele Sanctuary
description: A beautiful pilgrimage church located on a hill, known for its stunning architecture and panoramic views.

name: Stadtbücherei Würzburg im Falkenhaus
description: A central library housed in the historic Falkenhaus, offering a wide range of media and reading spaces.

description: A discount supermarket chain offering a variety of groceries and household products.

description: A popular discount supermarket known for its range of affordable groceries and weekly special offers.

description: A local supermarket offering a selection of fresh produce, meats, and daily essentials.

name: Ahsa Türkischer Supermarkt
description: A Turkish supermarket offering a variety of Middle Eastern and Mediterranean products.

name: L'Osteria
description: An Italian restaurant known for its oversized pizzas and classic pasta dishes in a lively atmosphere.

name: Brauerei-Gasthof Alter Kranen
description: A brewery and restaurant offering traditional German dishes and house-brewed beers with river views.

name: Café Centrale
description: A central café offering a variety of coffee specialties, pastries, and light meals in a modern setting.

name: Kulturspeicher Würzburg
description: A cultural center and museum housed in a former grain storage building, featuring modern art exhibitions.

name: Martin von Wagner Museum
description: A university museum showcasing a collection of antiquities, paintings, and graphic art.

description: The main library of the University of Würzburg, offering extensive academic resources and study spaces.

description: A vibrant taqueria offering authentic Mexican street food, including a variety of tacos and quesadillas.

name: Marienkapelle
description: A Gothic-style chapel located in the market square, known for its striking red and white exterior and historical significance.

name: Neumünster Collegiate Church
description: A Romanesque church featuring impressive Baroque architecture and the tomb of the famous minstrel Walther von der Vogelweide.

name: Netto Marken-Discount
description: A discount supermarket chain offering a wide range of groceries and household items at affordable prices.

name: Penny Markt
description: A budget-friendly supermarket known for its weekly specials and a variety of fresh produce.

name: Stadt Würzburg (City Hall)
description: The historic city hall of Würzburg, featuring beautiful Gothic architecture and serving as the seat of local government.
